attributes.action: propose that Oyster cards should be useable on all forms of public transport.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If the forward thinking of the Transport for London department, and other national bodies, is to discourage cash fares in favour of the Oyster card, then please make is useable on ALL forms of public transport, rather than separating it out between trains, underground, trams, and buses.
